title: List of Antalyaspor seasons
text: <a href="Antalyaspor">Antalyaspor</a> is a <a href="Football%20in%20Turkey">Turkish</a> professional <a href="football%20team">football</a> club located in the city of <a href="Antalya">Antalya</a>. The club colours are red and white and they play their home matches at <a href="New%20Antalya%20Stadium">Antalya Arena</a>. Domestically, the club has won the <a href="TFF%20First%20League">First League</a> twice, in 1982 and 1986. They also finished as runners-up for the <a href="Turkish%20Cup">Turkish Cup</a> in 2000.
